summary: The sword-wielding warrior, Amethea, embarks on a life-or-death mission to liberate her sister from the clutches of an evil monarch. However, only torture and death await her. Can a man alone break the will of the valiant Barbarian Queen?
cast: Lana Clarkson|Katt Shea|Frank Zagarino|Dawn Dunlap|Susana Traverso|Victor Bo|Armando Capo|Andrea Barbieri|Tony Middleton|Andrea Scriven|Roberto Catarineu|Matilde Mur|Eddie Pequenino|Patrick Duggan|Lucy Tiller|Ivan Grey|Theodore McNabney|Ricardo Jordán|John Head|Daniel Seville|Eva Adanaylo|Enrique Fynn Sastre|Grace Castle|Luis Alday|Norman Friedman|Alexander Essex|Daniel Ripari|Alfredo Alesandrini|Arturo Noal|Marcos Woinsky
keywords: female frontal nudity|sword and fantasy|f rated|male rear nudity|gladiator battle
title: La Reina de Barbaria
